name: EightO'ClockCoffee
0:
”Alexa open eight o'clock”
”Alexa ask eight o'clock to tell a few brewing tips”
”Alexa ask eight o'clock to give me a recipe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eight o'clock
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Explore the aroma and bold flavors of Eight O’Clock Coffee on Alexa to make your coffee experience more delightful, and that too, with just your voice. Are you craving for a cup of hot coffee or cold? Ask Eight O' clock Coffee for DIY recipes or try brewing tips for a fine aromatic result. With a range of recipes for hot, cold, sweet, and even savory options, we’ve got you covered for every mood. Don’t know what coffee you feel like having? No worries. Just ask for a surprise and we’ll make our recommendation especially curated for you!
A wide variety of recipes or expert tips on brewing are not all,get answers to the questions you may have around your favorite coffee including the types, available variants, and their prices! In addition, we’ve dedicated a special section on the legacy of Eight O’Clock Coffee. Let’s get cracking, say ‘Alexa, Open eight o'clock ’ and begin your journey.
About Eight O’Clock Coffee:
EOC with a legacy of 160+ years has been America’s most loved coffee brand, proudly roasting coffee in Maryland. Over the years, we've explored new varieties, changed our look, rolled out ground, and single serve coffee, while keeping some things intact, such as the classic flavors across 100+ varieties.
priv:
